title: Double Exposure (Nature/Human)
concept: A landscape that reveals a human silhouette when zoomed out.
narration: We see the world not as it is, but as we are. Shift your perspective.

scenes.prompt_image: A mysterious landscape with two trees bending towards each other, a moon in the center, forming the silhouette of a human skull, optical illusion, double exposure, surrealism, 8k
scenes.prompt_video: Camera slowly zooms out, the landscape elements align to clearly reveal the skull shape, eerie atmosphere, cinematic movement
